title: Strengthening Business Strategy Competencies: Sociocultural Interaction for International Mobility Learning Programs

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can perform at least three meaningful interactions with local culture members through a mobile platform
Learners can propose at least two improvements for international mobility programs by applying sociocultural learning theory
Learners can develop collaboration strategies to overcome cultural stereotypes through project-based assessment and present execution results

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
